transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Ji sir boliye.
Executive: Haan, Nasir bhai good afternoon.
Customer: Ji, very good afternoon.
Executive: Vivek bol raha hun IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji boliye.
Executive: Haan, aapne call kiya tha customer care se, to aapne baap ki baat ho gayi aapke account manager se?
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji meri baat ho gayi unse. Samjha diya mere ko.
Executive: Haan, confirm ho gaya sir.
Customer: Actually kya keh rahe hain sir?
Executive: Wo confirm ho gaya sara kuch issue chal raha tha.
Executive: Achcha, haan wo actually usage vagaira thoda sa delay ho raha tha aur response rate thoda sa kam hua tha, unhone bataya bhi hoga aapko. Is vajah se thodi sa impact gaya hai, haan listing pe, inquiries pe, calls pe thoda sa impact gaya hai.
Executive: Wo fir se ho jayega, sahi ho jayega, aap thoda sa usage abhi badhayenge na, usage karenge to fir se ho jayega sab. Aur ek cheez aur dekha maine ki jo jaise pehle jo leads aap consume karte the buyleads to jo buyleads agar aati thi matlab zero to four hours ke andar, theek hai, char ghante ke andar jo buyleads aari, char ghante ke andar aap jo consume karte the pehle wo kareeb 60%, 65% aise 44%, 58% bhi gaya hai, theek hai. Lekin abhi currently is mahine jo hai 49 ho gaya hai.
Customer: Achcha achcha.
Executive: November mein haan, to wo bhi impact kiya hai ki wo uska jo usage hai thoda sa kam ho gaya hai.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Theek hai, to bas yahi reason hai ki thoda sa impact aaya hai in sab cheezon mein aur abhi isko thoda sa sahi karenge to ho jayega, bilkul sahi ho jayega. Iske alawa koi issue to nahi hai sir?
Customer: Nahi aur koi issue nahi hai abhi to filhal theek hai ji.
Executive: Theek hai, aur issue ye jo chal raha hai ki mere ko kuch product vagaira the wo bhi abhi thode add karne hain. Chahta to main khud bhi add kar sakta tha lekin main unhe karam sahi tarike se aap log hi matlab wo log hi manager hi sahi kar payenge achchi tarike se.
Executive: Theek hai, number mil gaya na aapko manager ka?
Customer: Haan number mil gaya mere contact ho gaya unse baat ho gayi meri unse.
Executive: Haan wo number aap save kar lijiyega wo account manager rahenge aapke abhi hain. To aap na jab bhi free ho jayiyega jo bhi product vagaira jo bhi add karwane hain aap unse ek bar communicate karke ek bar baat karke fir share kar lijiyega sab.
Customer: Okay sir, okay okay.
Executive: Theek hai, iske alawa aur koi aur kai help ek cheez aur maine ek dekha maine reviews jo aapki thi. To wo kya hai na review rating jo hai aapki wo aur bhi jyada mangi customer se char four out of five chal rahi hai to aur bhi customer se mangi kyuki do teen negative reviews bhi aa gaye the to is vajah se char ho gayi hai. To isko improve kar lijiye jo agar kisi customer se deal hota hai baat hoti hai to aap jarur unko boliye ki aapko rate kare review kare aur jab rate aur review karenge to wo five six customer jante bhi to sir us cheez ko jante bhi to nahi hai customer samjhana bada bhari ho jata hai unhe.
Executive: [inaudible] haan ye to hai.
Customer: Haan ye masla hai ki wo jante nahi hai unhe samjhana bada bhari ho jata hai to thoda sa ye bhi thoda issue hai mere par kuch aisa tarika nikalo jo main un pe kuch reviews vagaira kuch dalu aur wo check karke aur hatho hath wo rating de mere ko. Kuch aisa ho jaye to wo bhi jyada behtar rahega.
Executive: [inaudible] jaise rating aisa hai nahi hai jab koi bhi inquiry aati hai jaise buylead aapne consume kiya ya fir calls aaye aapke pass ya fir inquiry aayi na to aapke pass waha pe option ho jata hai ask for reviews ka to ask for review ka option aata hai jaise hi aap click karenge unke pass chala jayega to aap bol dijiye turant hand to hand baat ho rahi hai to hand to hand de de wo.
Customer: Chalo theek hai main bol de.
Executive: Wo aise kar lenge to ho jayega kyuki na wahi hai jo abhi September mein September mein ek aayi thi August mein ek aayi thi aur uske baad se June mein do aayi thi. To is vajah se rating kam rating aayi thi to is vajah se thoda sa down hua down kya hai wahi achcha hai bas char achcha hai bekar nahi hai lekin four out of five chal raha hai to isko aur bhi badha sakte hain hum 4.5, 4.6 tak le ja ke ja sakte hain isko. Theek hai to do char positive rating aayega to apne aap ye 4.6, 4.5 ho jayega sir.
Customer: Theek theek theek theek.
Executive: Calls ka thoda sa unhone bataya hoga calls ka bhi kam hua hai flow to beech mein calls vagaira bhi kafi miss ho rahi thi. To 78% 78% ki karan ye miss ka mere ko pata nahi chalta actually hota kya hai ki matlab calls jo bhi aati hai hum barabar uthate hain hum ye nahi chahenge ki IndiaMART ki call miss jaye lekin kehne ka matlab ye hai calls vagaira mere ko aisa lagta hai ki kuch call ruk jati hai matlab customer karta hai lekin hamare pass aati nahi hai pata nahi wo bhi kya koi issue chal raha hai samajh mein nahi aa raha mere mein koi true caller app bhi nahi hai pehle tha uski vajah se bhi batai thi ki bhai uski vajah ho sakti hai ki calls vagaira ruk jati hai beech mein kai bar se to wo bhi nahi hai mere mein ab to main bilkul sada chala raha hun calls ki vajah se IndiaMART ki call ki vajah se lekin pata nahi padta ye kaise miss ho jati hai hum to khub dhyan dete hain is cheez mein lekin bas kya kare.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: Theek hai koi issue nahi hai main calls vagaira ka agar miss bhi hoti hai na to lead management me dikh jata hai kiski call aayi thi kiska miss hua hai. To aap back call kar lenge to dikh jayega ki aapne call back kar liya hai aisa theek hai wahi se. Phone se hi use karte hain to phone se aapko dikh jayega agar phone se aap agar use karte hain kyuki almost dekha maine phone se hi jyada use karte hain aap theek hai.
Customer: Haan phone se hi jyada use karta hun main.
Executive: Hmm hmm chaliye theek hai to aapki baat ho gayi hai number mil gaya account manager ka number mil gaya to aap na unse coordinate kar lijiyega main abhi jo aapke customer care se call kiya tha ticket raise kiya tha aapne wo close kar raha hun theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai okay okay.
Executive: To haan uska feedback jayega aapko close ka feedback jayega to aap usme satisfied mark kar dena sir theek hai.
Customer: Okay sir okay.
Executive: Theek theek okay theek.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to add products to his profile.

- Facing issues with call connectivity.

- Wants to improve customer review ratings.



Resolution:

- Advised to coordinate with account manager for product addition.

- Executive explained how to ask for reviews.

- Ticket raised for customer care call will be closed.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- product, reviews, calls, account manager
